quotes.quote: Just remember when you post something, the computers remember forever.
The best way to get the right answer on the Internet is not to ask a question, it's to post the wrong answer.
You are responsible for everything you post and everything you post will be a reflection of you.
Every social media post should have a beautiful graphic. If there are two identical stories, the one with the beautiful graphic will always win.
Posts of honor are evermore posts of danger and of care.
The post of honour is a private station.
Posting a brag, humble or otherwise, and then waiting for people to respond is the equivalent of having a conversation in which all you do is wait for your turn to speak.
The post is the grand connecting link of all transactions, of all negotiations. Those who are absent, by its means become present; it is the consolation of life.
The only way you can be successful on a post or win at it is to be at cause over it.
Anyone can post messages to the net. Practically everyone does. The resulting cacophony drowns out serious discussion.
Lofty posts make great men greater still, and small men much smaller.
Every post is honorable in which a man can serve his country.
Make it simple. Make it memorable. Make it inviting to look at. Make it fun to read.
